text: With a modeling career that spans decades and numerous other gigs that have kept her in front of the camera steadily adding to her legacy, Heidi Klum has enjoyed an amount of longevity that isn ’ t commonly seen in the modeling or entertainment industry. So what exactly is her secret to showing up to every job, booking or photoshoot looking like a million bucks? The beauty has given birth to four children and still looks like the model she was before she had kids when she started in the 90s over 20 years ago. Klum is finally revealing her secret. She loves to exfoliate. What ’ s even better is that her favorite exfoliating scrub can be found at drugstores in the UK. It ’ s called Aapri.
